title: Welcome to My Blog
author: Haofan Wang
excerpt: Welcome to my personal blog! Here I will share my thoughts, experiences, and insights on topics related to AI, machine learning, computer vision, and generative models.

title: Understanding Diffusion Models: A Practical Introduction
author: Haofan Wang
excerpt: Diffusion models have revolutionized the field of generative AI, powering applications like DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, and Midjourney. Learn about the fundamentals of how they work.

title: The Journey of Building InstantID
author: Haofan Wang
excerpt: Building InstantID was an exciting journey that combined deep learning, computer vision, and practical product development. In this post, I'll share some insights from the development process.
